metadata.name: Use of Scriptrunner.exe
metadata.comment: The "ScriptRunner.exe" binary can be abused to proxy execution through it and bypass possible whitelisting

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\scriptrunner.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('scriptrunner.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -appvscript ')))

output.summary: The "ScriptRunner.exe" binary can be abused to proxy execution through it and bypass possible whitelisting

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use when App-v is deployed Reference: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Scriptrunner/
